website_summaries.verdict: Convenient hands-free shoe covers made of lightweight and easy to clean foam.
pros: No hands needed to take them off or put them on
Reusable thanks to durable and washable foam compound
Tub-like design keeps dirt and mud away while protecting shoes
cons: Sizing is based on shoe length rather than shoe size

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Service Professionals
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs as a service professional. I was amazed at how clean the bottoms remain and how much dirt they actually retain where I place my feet. We normally wear the booties; however, they are dangerous, inconvenient, and do not last long. I love the Tidy Trax and my customers think "they are neat." In my case the between size ended up being the smaller option of "Kc rather than" L." Better that they stay on my feet than come off all of the time. I do take them off on stairs and ladders and the customers understand. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Consejero

customer_reviews.title: What big feet you have
customer_reviews.text: These things work great. Easy on easy off once you get use to them. When I ordered mine My size was in between so I went with the smaller size. Measure the shoe or boot you plan on using this on. Other of your shoes may fit. Don’t think square toe boots work well with this. My Ariat square toe boots did not fit. I am very satisfied with this product. What you use it for is up to you. I’ll keep y’all posted on durability. They are clunky. Like clown shoes so be careful when wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is NOT flexible with multiple shoe styles
customer_reviews.text: The covers are clunky & stiff and only work perfectly with whatever one pair of shoes you measured to find your size... For example, I ordered a size C because I was wearing womens size 8m clogs when I measured my soles heel to toe.... Today I was wearing size 8m snow boots and the covers are too small and do not work with this pair of boots.....just not very flexible.... literally or figuratively.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great and don't slip off my feet even when kneeling ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had so many compliments from customers about these. They work great and don't slip off my feet even when kneeling down. My recommendation to anyone buying these, go a size larger than the chart. I went exactly the size the chart said and they were almost too small.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! And I've used em both ways - as a boot cover to protect the floors when running in wearing yard boots. ALSO worn them into the yard to keep my boots from getting soaked by the boggy grass after a rain. Just follow the sizing instructions & trust them - fits as sizing chart states. Love these things, they fit my Birkenstock too! - I wear birkenstock as house slippers, if I need to run out into the yard I slip these on and no worries of getting them all wet!
customer_reviews.author: Taka

customer_reviews.title: Time saver. A must for contractors
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to be able to move from outside to inside without having to take off your shoes especially when you work outside but need to come inside. Well made. Should last a long time. A must for any contractor that comes into contact with clients in their homes.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe covers I've found
customer_reviews.text: Husband has especially deep lugs on his work boots. He goes into bare dirt buildings, then through snow, or vice versa--makes for a lot of mud. These keeps the mud contained pretty well (about 95%), and they're easy to put on and take off. Saves hours sweeping up mud on bare floors every day. When they start getting filled up with too much mud, let them dry out and knock out the mud outside. These are a winner in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: His friends even think they're cool (as they're unlacing & lacing back up their shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband who comes in & out of the house from our farm or workshop with God-knows-what on his shoes. Doesn't have to sneak in the house (thinking I won't notice the trail he leaves) now that he has these. His friends even think they're cool (as they're unlacing & lacing back up their shoes while he just slips these on & off quickly). Great present, even if it is more for the wife's benefit!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very simple. My boot size was right on the line between size J and K...so i bought K to be sure i didnt have issues. They worked well but came off sometimes when kneeling. Next time ill get the smaller size. Great product! UPDATE: changed boots and they were a little bigger. Now they rarely slip off unless I'm kneeling. Best buy ever!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Quan

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: If you do any type of in home service like cable or satilite you need these. they slip right on and dont come off until you need them to. customers love it when i wear these to keep theirs floors clean. beats putting on those old slip over shoe covers. just make sure you measure your boots and get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: quincy polk

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 8 wide steel toe work boot with a fairly high 2-3inch heel. They're 6in shaft and it takes a few minutes to lace and unlace, and if I just want to go inside to use the bathroom, or if I'm working outside and inside (lugging things out, idk) it's annoying to have to take a knee and take them off and put them back on. I step right into these Trax and keep walking into the house, and then just step on the heel tab to take them off. Don't even have to stop walking. I'm getting some for my father and coworkers cause these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: FauxFox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! But be careful with wet boots.
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for months now, wear them 5-6 days a week 3-6 jobs a day and they still look brand new. Be advised: they will hold water where your boot sits, the water can run onto the floor if the toes of the boot covers tip downward. Put these top down at the door and really wipe your boots on whatever mat is available before stepping into these and going inside. Have thought about gluing a thin insole inside to absorb water. Will update if doing so works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Even keeps your shoes clean.
customer_reviews.text: Most people buy this to keep the floors clean from the shoes that they are wearing.. however I used it for the opposite. Getting back into bowling I invested in a very nice pair of shoes that of course I want to keep clean when not on the lanes. This works extremely well and I highly recommend to all bowlers. Of course you could use shoe slips however this is quicker and easier. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Blittenb

customer_reviews.title: YAY!! No more dirt tracked on my floors!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE these! Super easy for the guys to put on and take off. They don't even use hands! Perfect for those quick trips inside when it's a pain to have to take work boots off (or so I'm told) AND no mess on my floors! A win for everyone! Just use the chart and actually measure the sole of the boot that will be used in the Tidy Trax to get a perfect fit. My husband has had his for two years and they still work perfectly and stay on the boots the same as they did when new. My son just got this pair and now everyone is happy!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest investment I ever made
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Saves my back from bending over to put on shoe covers when I'm in customers homes. Easy to clean between uses. Slips on like a dream. Great conversational piece at the door. Cons: Accidentally left a pair at a customers home and never saw it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Mai

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Husband work boots fit right in as well as most of his tennis shoes we are both very happy for this product I recommend for everyone and make sure you measure closely to the shoe you want it to fit majority of the time
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Only works with the exact sole size, not shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Only works with the exact sole size, not shoe size. So if it fits well your pair of bulky boots it'll probably be too big and drop when using smaller shoes.
customer_reviews.author: PuxaSporting

customer_reviews.title: they are way too large for the 9 1/2 -10 size shoe and I felt like I was trying to walk around in snow shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how these are supposed to work; they are way too large for the 9 1/2 -10 size shoe and I felt like I was trying to walk around in snow shoes that were meant for someone twice my size.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: One leg
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a coworker who has one leg and needed something he could slip on and off since he was unable To bend his knee. His whole shoe came off when trying to step out of it. Now we can’t use it as no one has the same size foot as him either good concept though just needs better duarablity.
customer_reviews.author: kim559

customer_reviews.title: Tidy Trax size H
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to protect our bowling shoes when walking thru the bowling alley. They work okay. A bit bullky but not overly so. They do have to measured to the shoe lenght not the shoe size. Good for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money- they don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Idea seemed good, but despite measuring correctly, only 1 of the 2 fit the cougar paw boot. The plastic so stiff, no flex to get on boot. I contacted the company twice with phone messages asking if there is some trick, and once by email. no response, ever. Unfortunately, passed the return window because of Hurricane work out of state.
customer_reviews.author: LarryKris

customer_reviews.title: time savings galore
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gotten a pair of these about 20 years ago. They save so much time, no more taking my shoes off when I need to run into the house for something. I take them off toe first, if I try to use the lip on the heel my shoe comes off with it.
customer_reviews.author: blossomcorners

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were too small for my father's size 13 boot. We returned them with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: I could finally do away with those stupid shoe cover sock things. The only question I have now, how long will they last? Time will tell. I've been using them for a month straight now, and have had no problems. Customers love them, and other serviceman ask me about them. They're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: QualityMusicServices

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I work in my garden a lot, and I'm constantly coming in and out of my house. These save me the trouble of removing my gardening shoes each time. I'll be interested to see whether the bristles that keep the covers attached to my shoes will wear out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Hey they work
customer_reviews.text: Nice to pop on and off . As a bachelor without a maid makes life easier on me .Allot less clean up and no hassle fighting my boots off to go in and out.
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat awkward  but handy
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. light weight , pretty easy to get on and off , but they are kind like something Goofy would wear, that awkward sometimes .
customer_reviews.author: Finestkind

customer_reviews.title: Easy Step In & Removal
customer_reviews.text: As a Home Performance tester, I have to work in homes where the homeowner expects me to remove my shoes. I quickly found that climbing on a ladder in bare feet was painful so I started wearing booties over my shoes. They worked fine but weren't easy to get on and off. I bought a pair of these and they work great. Easy to step into and remove without bending down and the soft material will not scratch floors. The only slight (very slight) negative is that they are oversize and take a bit of getting use to on the first job.
customer_reviews.author: HHG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a service man getting into people's home on a daily basisthis is a must have, qreat quality and perfect grip as im walking.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m a building inspector and have to spend time in mud and in finished houses every day and they are amazing!!! Save so much time, easy in and easy off and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great for bowling
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves these!! He uses them for bowling to keep his bowling shoes from getting wet.We had to order more for the rest of his bowling..Might have to put in a bulk order for his bowling tournament in May😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Qyt Storrm

customer_reviews.title: These will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome I can't believe no one thought of them before! I am a dog walker, and have to truck through mud and snow and then enter client's homes. With these, I never leave dirt or anything else on my client's rugs and floors. Easy on, easy off, too. Just a suggestion, though. If you are exactly between two sizes, go down. The first pair I ordered were just a tad too big, and they wouldn't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wrublewski

customer_reviews.title: Light weight contractor shoe cover  for home entry.
customer_reviews.text: This is very good shoe covers for anyone who needs to walk inside the home with work boots on. I cannot imagine anyone to work in them for more than few minutes. Unfortunately I had to return this item, because our handyman shoe size is 15. The biggest size only fit size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Elzbieta

customer_reviews.title: You wont find a better quality boot cover out there.
customer_reviews.text: Saw these in action by a co-worker and had to have them, my boot was 1/16" off the line for next size up but I bought the L size anyways rather than the recommendation for the next size up. They fit my boots but are snug so I ordered the next size up which will arrive later today (was my plan to order 2 sizes anyways), should be a looser fit. Love these boot covers, my co-worker has a couple years on his and they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Campbell

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for outside .... they work super good. I almost slipped and fell when wearing them inside a store.....I didn’t know they are really NOT made for indoors at all but I should have figured that out on my own lol !
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for over 6 months and they are holding up awesome! These are the best thing for anyone doing residential work inside of homes to keep your shoes from tracking dirt into the home. Easy on, Easy off! No more bending over to take time using slip-on shoe covers, just drop at the front door and step into them to and go in and then coming out of the home you walk out the door and step on the back of one and pull out and then the other as all with the other foot and your are done! Takes only 1-3 seconds to put on or take off! Rinse clean for easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the floors cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I keep mine on the porch. Put them on when going outside for the mail when it is muddy. Easy to put on and take off. They stay on well. I think they are a bit pricey for what they are but they are well made and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, well worth it for everyday in and out of the house while keeping your boots on.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, these are great. I love being able to go in and out of my workshop without having to unlace my work boots anymore. Best purchase to keep my house cleaner in a long time. Love how easy they come off and on!!!
customer_reviews.author: James cole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for “off limit” areas
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tidy Trax!!! Excellent for quick change while bowling when I have to go out of the bowling pit area!! Easy on and easy off!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Clonk / awkward when walking, not that comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to walk in. I’m going back to my pro shoe covers.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for about 4 months and they are great. I'm in & out of people's houses fixing air conditioners and they keep me from tracking dirt in. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on boot when stepping.
customer_reviews.text: Cover is too stiff causing my boot heel to slip out of the cover, once that happens the cover just falls off. Yes I used the measuring tool as instructed. I have tried a shoe-in before and will go back to that even though it is not that comfortable over the toes; but at least it stays on.
customer_reviews.author: k steve

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I wear orthotics, so I can’t take off my shoes when I clean my client’s homes. The “ Frankenshoe took a bit of getting used to. Now I can’t imagine cleaning without it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than traditional shoe covers, safety, convenience, function and durability. They do take some getting used to, first day I wore them all day, leg muscles were sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use these as bowling shoe covers. The others ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these as bowling shoe covers. The others just wear out too fast so ill give these a try. A little cumbersome at first but I got used to them.
customer_reviews.author: tomc585

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Lasts long. Easy to clean if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other shoe cover, these make it easier on my knees and back. Much less bending over and the continuous twisting on my knees putting on and taking off shoe covers all day. Just step into them going in and step out of them going out. Same for going from dirty concrete basement floors to carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: No more setting your gear down and doing the balancing act to put booties on.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised and then some
customer_reviews.text: I use these as bowling shoe covers. Have so for now going on over six years. I'm on my 3rd pair. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a great conversation starter to put these on before entering a customer's home. They always ask about them and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made but rather heavy. Need snug fit and proper shoe size or they fall off easily. I ordered these for my partner and was hoping I could use these as well. Even though my foot is only a bit smaller they fall off quickly due to heavy weight. They are clunky as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Jag

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these work great but my customers thunk they are amazing. I like not having to bend down and over and risk losing my balance to get regular booties on. These you just step into.
customer_reviews.author: gbpackerz

customer_reviews.title: Protect shoes
customer_reviews.text: This item fits well and does a great job preventing changing of and protection of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Student2011

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/Easy off
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed to keep our household clean in gardening season. The mud stays in the shoe covers and not on the floors. They pop right on and right off with little effort. No need to bend over at all. Going in and out during a long project is no longer a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that the are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These have worked extremely well. I sized them according to the manufacturer's instructions, and they fit perfectly. I like the fact that the are comfortable, stay on my boots even when kneeling down, and come off easily when you step on the heel tab. I would highly recommend these for anyone who wants to keep their floors clean without having to always take their boots off.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product, our techs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these a while ago for one of my service techs, and he loves them. They are easy to put on/take off, no bending necessary, just slip right on. They keep our customers' floors clean, and it saves the techs a lot of time versus trying to put the plastic booties on over their clunky work boots. We tried these with one tech, and it wasn't long before all the others wanted them too. We've now purchased a few pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Need to be properly fitted.
customer_reviews.text: Measuring as per specs , the "Tidy Trax" were oversized. Instead of "L" it probably should be "K" size for me. Is there a possibility of a swap out?
customer_reviews.author: Muhsin S.

customer_reviews.title: Compliments received daily...
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for, to be able to walk into potential customer's home and protect their floors from the stuff on the bottom of my shoes. Oddly enough, I found out that they only fit certain shoes...in other words all size 11 shoes are not the same length, so choose your Tidy Trax size carefully while keeping the shoes you typically wear in mind. I get a compliment almost every time I wear these into a prospect's home and 50% of the homeowners want to know where they can get a pair.
customer_reviews.author: DanI

customer_reviews.title: Get a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Wore them once everything was great loved them. A month later put them on at a customer's house and they wouldn't stay on. I put them on and with the first step they fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I actually only use the left one because I se it for bowling on my slide foot. More and more are loving these, they are easy on and easy off, so damn convenient, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely like the fact I can slip these on and off ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm in and out of clients houses all day. Definitely like the fact I can slip these on and off hands free. They hold and water that are on my boats. My only hang up is that one pair of my work boots are suede... the little dimples that hold it to your boat leave depressions in the suede.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a home inspector and he loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Ohiomom

customer_reviews.title: A bit large
customer_reviews.text: Size chart is a bit off. Shpuld have gotten the smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe covers.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I ordered size L based on Tidy Trax instructions. My shoe measured 13" and the instructions said I needed size L. Wrong. They were too big. I ordered size K and they are perfect. I'm in the garden a lot and wanted to protect my sneakers from dirt, mud etc. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM J. OREILLY

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit right
customer_reviews.text: I carefully followed the instructions for choosing a size, but my shoes do not fit in these. But they are so big, I would not want to get the next size up, I would not be able to walk in them. Sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Nani G

customer_reviews.title: Work great but look ridiculous. Be ready to explain where you bought them.
customer_reviews.text: They run a bit large. They are just as ugly as they seem. They work great only problem is; with stairs as the heel gets in the way and may trip you. I have received many complements from my customers, "happy that I cared enough to spend 40 Bucks to protect their carpet."
customer_reviews.author: Tader

customer_reviews.title: Makes going in and out of the house easy,  without having to take off dirty shoes each time.
customer_reviews.text: These really stick to your shoes, so you don’t have to remove dirty ones. My wife loves that our carpeting stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Your wife will love you! Gone are the days of tracking all the nasty dirt and muck from outside into your clean house. Make sure to follow the sizing steps to insure you order the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Ledonne

customer_reviews.title: BIG but not clumsy.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. they are VERY LARGE in appearance, but they don't hinder walking as you might expect. I have fairly large feet, but these look like boats! They work, they stay on and I'm happy with them. I've had several people ask about them. (Realtors, contractors, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Hands free slip on shoe covers
customer_reviews.text: I use the tidy track shoe covers while when i am bowling.I step in the covers to take a rest room or walk around behind the lanes when the floor could be wet. I just step in and out never having use my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is intended to do and so light weight
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. If you are in a service trade these ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. If you are in a service trade these are definately worth the money. I actually have three pairs in the service van, cause on occasion I forget them at a customers house. All my customers love them as well. Best investment I have made in my career.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berry

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the carpet way cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Bought every size for the warehouse to put on their feet before coming in the office. Keeps the carpet way cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slip on and off
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says it does. Easy to get on and off. Keeps dirt and chemicals off the floor and out of the house. It was hard to find these on the Amazon search though.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: Get these way better than standard issue boot covers
customer_reviews.text: Any Directv Techs out there? Get these way better than standard issue boot covers. Make sure you measure your boot properly and if in between two sizes get the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Ryan Olsen

customer_reviews.title: What a great Way to show customers how professional your company is ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great Way to show customers how professional your company is by bringing these to look at a job in someone's house, what a great product nice work tidy trax!
customer_reviews.author: Quality

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sizing Reference
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size off their information....Way TOO BIG...3 inches longer than my shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Coreen B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs a higher heel gripper.
customer_reviews.text: They go on very nice but with the style of boot I have they don't stay on very well unless I can put my foot into them just right then it's not very comfortable on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Tidy Trax are what they say
customer_reviews.text: I saw a service tech with these on a job and said that I had to look into them. I am so glad I did. They have helped me numerous times around the house. My wife and children hate it when I walk in with snow on my boots and walk from the garage to the office to take them off. These have helped me a lot. Cons: The side grippers don't grab my leather work boots as well as I would like. they have a tendency to slip and clomp, so you have to walk slow and watch that they don't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: house tracker

customer_reviews.title: they worked just fine. I recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Works as I expected. Initially they seemed a little small (my shoe size is borderline high) but after a wearing or two, they worked just fine. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE CLARK

customer_reviews.title: TidyTrax are great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a plumber and we had used the disposable shoe covers for years before finding Tidy Trax. These are way more convenient and I love that even at home he can come in and out without removing his boots and my floors stay clean. The work just as they state in the ad and we were not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for keeping the house clean and your boots on too
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be able to run into the house from the garden or other outdoor work without having to remove my work shoes. They are serving this function very nicely. The first few steps are a little awkward due to the added size, but I soon got used to that. Removing them is simple and hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Medtech

customer_reviews.title: Difficult if you have big feet to begin with
customer_reviews.text: too clunky to be in any way useful for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Beuret

customer_reviews.title: Easy use shoe covers.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off is the main feature of shoe covers for me. The make you walk tall 1/2” to be exact lol. Can be washed easily and dry with a towel. Durability to To be determined.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Mowry

customer_reviews.title: Unique product that works as well as advertized ... recommend.
customer_reviews.text: EZ to put on/off ... keeps my tradition shoes free of mud when coming into the house. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awkward to carry versus roll up boot covers, easily put on and taken off
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stack

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these things
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these things! They fit perfectly on my shoes. They're so easy to get on and off and have not come off when I wasn't purposely trying to get them off. They wash off easily with a water hose. I've had a ton of positive comments about them from clients.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Order the correct size, use some caution when wearing them
customer_reviews.text: I keep a pair in two vehicles , own 4 pairs. Easy to put on , and remove . They prevent floors from getting soiled when you have wet , muddy, soiled shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Try to get your size is problematic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Try to get your size is problematic. Using alphabets for sizing cost unnecessary problem to the end user.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get right size
customer_reviews.text: They very hard to get the right size for your shoes, the size chart is very confusing and not user friendly will never buy another pair impossible to return and get right size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a service tech and am in and out of houses all day long. These are way easier then putting booties on. You just have to make sure the size is right for the boot. I happen to were a size 13. All boots are different lengths due to construction, and the size of the sole. So you pretty much have to stick with one pair of boots. Make sure you get a accurate end to end measurement with a tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P. Brentwood

customer_reviews.title: My customers loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I am a cable installer and have had these for three days. All my customers loved that I had these.
customer_reviews.author: cable installer

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for new home construction
customer_reviews.text: I work in new home construction and in and out of finished homes all day. I was going through ten dollars per day in disposable shoe guards until I found tidy traxs. They are great, sizing chart was perfect for me (size k = 11.5 us)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: These really work for my husband! The first set I ordered were too large (my fault) but once he received the smaller size, they've been great. They stay on his shoes securely (even when walking through snow) and they're quick to put on/take off.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Shopper in UT

customer_reviews.title: Bowling slippers!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes r great, using them as blowing slippers !
customer_reviews.author: dorethad

customer_reviews.title: Stop nagging your husband to take his boots off before coming in the house.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing if your husband tracks dirt or other gross things in the house on his work boots. Just slip them on and off hands-free. They fit his work boots and other shoes too. Definitely a must-have for our farming household!
customer_reviews.author: dpsteno

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a home inspector so I'm constantly going in and out of houses. These are awesome! Easy on and off. Don't have to keep up with shoe covers anymore. Shoes can be wet and muddy but doesn't matter. There are small extensions on the back to help kick them off. Have to be careful going down stairs but you get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Itchybuzz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too big and bulky, the size J was too big for my size 12 shoes and boots. Very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: A must for any tech
customer_reviews.text: I do direct tv installs and these work great hands free on and off great product Customers love these keeps the floors clean and dry

customer_reviews.title: great product, Lifesaver for the contractor having to go ...
customer_reviews.text: great product ,Lifesaver for the contractor having to go in and out of peoples homes ,Most especially during wet muddy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Almost Snow shoe size / do work great
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tidy Trax. They do exactly what they are supposed to. Wearing them, there are no more dirty footprints on my floor. Perfect to go in and out without the need to untie my work boots. Just ensure to order the size matching your boots.
customer_reviews.author: M Linden

product_meta.title: Tidy Trax J Hands Free Shoe Covers , Size J,GREY
product_meta.description:
Size:JAMAZON.COM
Keep dirt and debris where it belongs with Tidy Trax "Hands-Free" Shoe Covers. These lightweight, durable, and flexible covers quickly slide over your boots or shoes to envelop dirty soles and help keep floors clean. Ideal for gardeners, construction workers, or anyone who works outside, these shoe covers eliminate time-consuming cleanup and make it easy to go in and out of the house without making a mess.



Easy-to-Use Shoe Covers Stop Dirt in Its Tracks
Whether you're a gardener or contractor, you don't want to track your mess indoors. Thankfully, with Tidy Trax shoe covers, it's quick and easy to prevent tracks. Simply insert your grimy shoes toe-first into the shoe covers and push your heels down. The covers' molded fingers firmly grip your shoes and keep them in position. To take off Tidy Trax, step on the heel kicker and lift your heel--there's no need to bend over or sit down to take them off or put them on.Durable, Easy-to-Clean Material
Tidy Trax lightweight, sturdy shoe covers are designed for daily use. They're made of molded EVA foam and won't scratch or harm floors. The extended heel kickers are reinforced with heavy-duty TPU plastic, and the inserts are molded fingers that grip your shoes to help them stay in place. To quickly and easily remove mud and grime from your Tidy Trax, grab a hose and give the shoe covers a blast of water. For dried-on dirt, clap the covers together to loosen and remove the debris.

 Find the Perfect Fit
Tidy Trax sizing is determined by "shoe length"--NOT shoe size. To find the shoe cover that fits you best, measure the sole of your shoe from heel to toe, and then compare the length to the Tidy Trax size chart. Tidy Trax come in 12 convenient sizes that approximately fit men's shoe sizes 6 to 14 and women's shoe sizes 4 to 11.

What's in the Box
One pair of Tidy Trax Hands-Free Shoe Covers.







FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tidy Trax are the amazing HANDS FREE shoe covers that allow a person to go indoors with dirty shoes on without leaving a single messy footprint. Not only do they eliminate making muddy tracks, they also eliminate the need to bend over to put them on or take them off. They are lightweight, durable, and wont mark or harm floors. Tidy Trax can also be used outdoors to keep nice shoes from getting dirty. The tub-like design helps keep the dirt and debris inside while walking indoors. This also works to protect clean shoes from getting dirty while walking outside in the elements. The rubber fingers are what holds Tidy Trax to your shoes. They flex just enough to let you in but are strong enough to hold on extremely well. The heel kicker on the back is what allow you to remove your Tidy Trax without bending over or using your hands. This product truly is HANDS FREE, MESS FREE, and HASSLE FREE! They are available in 12 sizes and one color: Light gray.
feature_bullets: Made of lightweight, durable foam that won't harm floors
No hands are needed to put them on or take them off
Clean up is as easy as rinsing them off with a hose
Can use them over and over
Flex tested in a footwear laboratory. Tidy Trax sizing is based on “shoe length”… NOT “shoe size”
